pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides Easy Access to Complex Systems Datasets // Provides easy-to-use and easy-to-access datasets from the Index of COmplex Networks (ICON) database available on the University of Colorado website. All datasets can be loaded with a single function call and new datasets are being slowly added from ICON at https://icon.colorado.edu. Specific ICON datasets of interest can be requested at the BugReports URL https://github.com/rrrlw/ICON/issues.
